camaradeputadosapi 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

deputados

Query data on representatives that are or were in office in any moment of time at the Brazilian House of Representatives

deputados()

Get a list of representatives

deputados_despesas()

Get a representative expenditures while in office for a given year

deputados_discursos()

Get a representative speeches

deputados_eventos()

Get a list of events a representative was present

deputados_frentes()

Get a list of parliamentary fronts for a representative

deputados_id()

Extract a representative Id

deputados_info()

Get general information from a representative

deputados_orgaos()

Get a list of bodies and commissions a representative is member

deputados_referencias()

Get metadata information for data related to 'deputados'

eventos

Query data on events that occurred or are on schedule at the Brazilian House of Representatives

eventos()

Get a list of events that occurred or are on schedule at the House of Representatives

eventos_deputados()

Get a list of representatives that attended a specific event

eventos_info()

Get information about a specific event

eventos_orgaos()

Get a list of bodies, commissions, agencies, etc. that organized an event

eventos_pauta()

Get a list of propositions that were or will be discussed in an event

eventos_referencias()

Get metadata information on data related to 'eventos'

eventos_votacoes()

Get information for voting processes in an event

frentes

Query data on parliamentary fronts created after 2003 at the Brazilian House of Representatives

frentes()

Get a list of parliamentary fronts

frentes_id()

Extract a parliamentary front Id

frentes_info()

Get general information about a parliamentary front

frentes_membros()

Get a list of members for a given parliamentary front

legislaturas

Query data on legislative periods for the Brazilian House of Representatives

legislaturas()

Get a list of legislative periods

legislaturas_id()

Extract a legislative period id

legislaturas_mesa()

Get information on speakers of the House of Representative for a given legislative period

partidos

Query data on Brazilian political parties

partidos()

Get a list of political parties

partidos_blocos()

Get a list of blocs at the Brazilian House of Representatives

partidos_id()

Extract a Brazilian Political Party ID

partidos_info()

Get information about a Brazilian political party

partidos_membros()

Get a list of representatives that are or were in office for a given Brazilian political party

proposicoes

Query data on propositions presented at the Brazilian House of Representatives

proposicoes()

Get a list of propositions presented at the Brazilian House of Representatives API

proposicoes_autores()

Get a list of authors for a given proposition

proposicoes_historico()

Get the historical record of a proposition at the House of Representatives

proposicoes_id()

Extract a proposition unique identifier

proposicoes_info()

Get information about a proposition of Brazilian House of Representatives

proposicoes_referencias()

Get metadata information for data related to 'proposicoes'

proposicoes_relacionadas()

Get a list of propositions related to a given proposition

proposicoes_temas()

Get a list of thematic areas related to a given proposition

proposicoes_votacoes()

Get information on voting procedures for a proposition and for those that affected a proposition

votacoes

Query data on voting processes at several bodies and commissions from the Brazilian House of Representatives

votacoes()

Get a list of voting processes

votacoes_info()

Get information on voting processes

votacoes_orientacoes()

Get voting guideline for a political party on a given voting process

votacoes_votos()

Get information on representatives voting behavior for a given voting process

orgaos

Query data on bodies and commissions from the Brazilian House of Representatives

orgaos()

Get a list of bodies and commissions

orgaos_eventos()

Get events that occurred or are on schedule for a given body or commission in between a time interval

orgaos_id()

Extract an unique identifier for a given body or commission

orgaos_info()

Get information on a Brazilian House of Representatives body or commission

orgaos_membros()

Get a list of roles of representatives members of a body or commission

orgaos_referencias()

Get metadata information for data related to 'orgaos'

orgaos_votacoes()

Get information on votings in a body or commission
